channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. Fine to Newsmax: Bar Immigration Until Security Is Fixed
item.description: Rep. Randy Fine, R-Fla., told Newsmax on Thursday that legal immigration should be halted until security and fraud concerns have been addressed, argui...

item.title: Del Cueto to Newsmax: Democrats Aim to Defend Illegals
item.description: Art Del Cueto, a veteran border official, told Newsmax on Thursday that anyone in the country illegally is breaking the law.

item.title: Don't Pop the Champagne Just Yet - Bush Admin Alum Warns JB Pritzker Over SCOTUS Nat'l Guard Decision
Our Gift to You This Holiday Season
Sens. Collins, Ossoff Renowned for Constituent Services
item.description: Sens. Susan Collins, R-Maine, and Jon Ossoff, D-Ga., are two of the most vulnerable senators seeking reelection in the 2026 midterm elections.

item.title: War Secretary Hegseth Vows More to Come in Nigeria
item.description: Secretary of War Pete Hegseth said Thursday night that U.S. forces struck Islamic State group targets in Nigeria on Christmas, confirming military act...

item.title: Lawmakers attempt to tackle NIL, giving it the 'old college try'
item.description: SCORE Act to regulate college athlete NIL deals faces uncertain future as Congress continues debates over treating student-athletes as employees.

item.title: Biden nearly invisible in own Christmas family photo as Hunter takes center stage

item.title: Nonprofit uses underwater technology to search for missing service members
item.description: Project Recover uses advanced underwater technology to locate missing service members from past conflicts. The nonprofit has repatriated 24 Americans.
